list_variables.description: The names of groups to which you want to add the policy.
list_variables.name: Groups
list_variables.required: Conditional. You must specify at least one of the following                   properties: Groups, Roles, or Users.

list_variables.description: The names of AWS::IAM::Roles to                   attach to this policy.
list_variables.name: Roles
list_variables.required: Conditional. You must specify at least one of the following                   properties: Groups, Roles, or Users.

list_variables.description: The names of users for whom you want to add the policy.
list_variables.name: Users
list_variables.required: Conditional. You must specify at least one of the following                   properties: Groups, Roles, or Users.

variables.description: A policy document that contains permissions to add to the specified users or                   groups.
variables.name: PolicyDocument
